title: Commercial property market value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2012 to 2016
summary: This statistic shows the total annual value of the Commercial property Market in the United Kingdom from 2012 , with a Commercial up to 2016 .
In 2015 , the Commercial property Market was valued at 650 billion British pounds .
This is Commercial to grow annually , with a total Market value of 883 billion by 2015 .
gold: This statistic illustrates the value of the commercial property market in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2016 . It can be seen that in 2016 the commercial property market reached a value of 883 billion British pounds .
